projects.name: (Dec 2013 - June 2016) | Jato - Speedwing
projects.description:
The Speedwing solution supported many more of the OEMs processes through the OEM Vehicle. The Speedwing solution designed to support JATO’s Customers’ business needs rather than delivering specific functionality or data.

Speedwing is a fully customizable solution with the ability to mirror OEM internal systems. It is therefore familiar and intuitive, easier to understand and combines both JATO and their content. At the heart of the solution is a high-performing database that combines Specifications, Prices, Options, Source Volumes, Volumes and Incentives into a single data model and is capable of being updated continuously or within a User-Defined schedule, with JATO data. Furthermore, Speedwing integrates seamlessly with new data, Customer data and Third party data.
